name: vss-api-cli

scripts.copy-schematics: mkdir -p dist/schematics/{domain,handler,port,service}/files && cp -r src/schematics/domain/files/* dist/schematics/domain/files/ && cp -r src/schematics/handler/files/* dist/schematics/handler/files/ && cp -r src/schematics/port/files/* dist/schematics/port/files/ && cp -r src/schematics/service/files/* dist/schematics/service/files/ && cp src/schematics/collection.json dist/schematics/ && cp src/schematics/domain/schema.json dist/schematics/domain/ && cp src/schematics/handler/schema.json dist/schematics/handler/ && cp src/schematics/port/schema.json dist/schematics/port/ && cp src/schematics/service/schema.json dist/schematics/service/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp src/schematics/domain/schema.d.ts dist/schematics/domain/ && cp src/schematics/handler/schema.d.ts dist/schematics/handler/ && cp src/schematics/port/schema.d.ts dist/schematics/port/ && cp src/schematics/service/schema.d.ts dist/schematics/service/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.deploy-docs: cd doc && USE_SSH=false DEPLOYMENT_BRANCH=gh-pages npm run deploy

description: CLI tool for scaffolding Middy-based serverless projects with great practices.
